__e: WELL, SHE HAS TO WORK A LOT SO WE CAN HAVE NICE THINGS AND A ROOF OVER OUR HEADS.
I met two guys, and I liked them. But I hate what's happened to them.
You guys are so nice, and I know it was really, really wrong, and I'm really, really, really sorry.
I'm sure they're all very nice, but that is not the group I'd like to be known as in.
We expected to be doing all sorts of naughty things that I can't tell you, cos we might need them in future.
And sure I got into great shape And met some fun people, but I ended up discovering my own dark side.
Listen - - I know from the outside it may seem like I have a perfect life, but the truth is there are a lot of jerks at school that aren't so nice to me.
But the point is, you were all really nice to me.
You can come along. But don't embarrass me or nothing.
